texts.t: Each enemy has a ::PC::% chance of turning back before reaching the target enclosure.
Shows the population of each enemy enclosure.
Animals from this enclosure will move twice as quickly.
Every animal from this enclosure has a ::PC::% chance of destroying two enemies when it attacks.
An animal dies every half-second within a certain range of this enclosure. The enclosure is sterile.
The population of this enclosure increases 50% more quickly.
Enemy animals move half as quickly within a certain range of this enclosure.
Take control of the enclosure to reveal its building.
Take control of the enclosure to construct the building of your choice.
